posts.title: 这是我的第一篇博客
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate Your browser does not support the video tag. Your browser does not support the audio tag. More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 想你
posts.text: 宝贝，睡了嘛想你哦 今天 是我们官宣的日子，摄像机记录下来了你甜甜的笑容 100件小事 结婚 生子 见家长 去旅游
